name: Cradle of Egypt (Premium)
description:
Meet the astonishing Cradle of Egypt – a gorgeous mash-up of fulfilling match-3 pleasure and splendid city-builder that will up-end everything you knew about puzzles! Restore the legendary Ancient Egypt civilization and claim the title of Pharaoh!

Cradle of Egypt is a rightful successor to the celebrity Cradle of… series of puzzle games. It is a mesmerizing journey through the lands of Pharaohs that ingeniously combines the challenge of finest match-3 puzzles with fascinating beauty of city building. Starting from a small village, you will match your way through five grand epochs to build the most glorious empire of all times. With your help the great Pyramids of Giza, the Sphinx, and magnificent temples of the ancient civilization will arise from ruins to grant you the eternal glory for generations to come. Earn the name of The Son of Ra and make it sound in the eons!

GAME FEATURES
- 100 levels of remarkable match-3 puzzles
- Collect resources and rebuild the ancient civilization
- Solve original mini-games to get new blueprints
- Timed and Relaxed modes: challenge your skills or play just for fun!
- A number of great bonuses and trophies to earn
- Mesmerizing hand drawn graphics and original music
- Still not sure? Then try free version - Cradle of Egypt

MORE AWEM GAMES

● Cradle of Rome 2 – Journey through 5 epochs of matching fun and exhilarating process of building the city!
● Golden Trails: The New Western Rush – Intriguing detective and romantic storylines and your chance to have the greatest adventure!
● Golden Trails 2: The Lost Legacy – Find over 2 000 hidden objects all around the world to reveal the secrets of the pirate's treasure!
